Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • epicminesweeper.logic.Board

  • public class Board
extends Object
    x Keeps track of actual game. Had nodes and initialized board, and handles logic of playing
    Author:
    Julius Uusinarkaus

        y - y-coord

      • flagNode

        public int flagNode(Node node)
        Returns 1/-1 depending on if tile was already flagged. Also keeps track of correctly flagged nodes in game.
        Parameters:
        node - Node to be flagged.
        Returns:
        -1 if node was already flagged, 1 if newly flagged, to keep count of flagged nodes.
